data.name: Card Tales
data.detailed_description:
Adventure card time!


Collect cards in your hand and use them to complete quests and defeat enemies.

SANDBOX

In Card Tales you can use cards to get an unexpected result. Apply your logic, experiment with new decisions.
The story is branched, there is a simplified "legacy" mechanics, your actions affect this game and the following games.

Use powerful weapons!


  • Unlock 3 stories, each with 2 different endings.
  • Some crazy, dangerous enemies.
  • Your actions affect the environment!

data.short_description: Make a choice! Collect unusual cards in your hand, use them wisely, and help the fate of the heroes come true.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, French, Italian, German, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4100U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 710
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 950
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Fantasy violence
Alcohol use
Covered nudity (Safe for work)
